objects.specification: The floor consists of warm honey-toned wooden planks laid end to end with a subtle grain pattern. The surface is smoothly finished with a light sheen for durability and warmth. It provides a comfortable, slip-resistant walking surface suitable for a classroom environment.

This front wall is finished in a smooth, matte off-white paint that reflects light evenly. The surface is seamless and professional, providing a neutral backdrop for mounted equipment and teaching materials.
This back wall is finished in a smooth, matte off-white paint that reflects light evenly. The surface is seamless and professional, providing a neutral backdrop for posters and clock display.

This left wall is finished in a smooth, matte off-white paint that reflects light evenly. The surface is seamless and professional, providing a neutral backdrop for the bookshelf and educational posters.
This right wall is finished in a smooth, matte off-white paint that reflects light evenly. The surface is seamless and professional, providing a neutral backdrop for windows and curtains.
The ceiling is covered with smooth white plasterboard, featuring a slight matte finish. It is clean and unobtrusive, allowing the lighting fixtures to stand out clearly.

A large teacher’s desk with a smooth, dark walnut-finish rectangular wooden top and rounded corners for safety. Beneath the surface are two shallow drawers and a central storage cabinet with brushed metal handles. The desk sits on sturdy square legs with matching finish and provides ample workspace for instructional materials.

An ergonomic teacher’s chair with a padded seat and backrest upholstered in dark brown fabric. The chair has a five-star metal base with caster wheels, adjustable height, and slight reclining capability for comfort during long lessons.

A student desk with a rectangular tabletop in medium-brown wood veneer and softly rounded edges. The desk is supported by powder-coated steel legs in a neutral gray finish and includes an open storage shelf beneath the top for books and supplies.

A large rectangular wall-mounted whiteboard with a smooth glossy writing surface and a slim silver aluminum frame. The surface is easy to clean and suitable for dry-erase markers. It includes a narrow marker ledge at the bottom for pens and erasers.

A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a crisp white rectangular housing and black vent accents. It features an adjustable lens on the front and ventilation slots on the sides. The design is functional and unobtrusive, blending with the ceiling.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a natural oak finish and five evenly spaced shelves. Each shelf holds a variety of colorful books arranged neatly. The frame is solid with slightly rounded corners and minimalistic side panels for a clean look.
A large rectangular window with clear tempered glass panes and a slim white frame. The glass is slightly reflective and the frame has clean straight lines for a modern look.
A pair of light beige fabric curtains with a soft drape and subtle texture. They hang from a slim metal rod and frame the window, adding warmth and a gentle contrast to the white frame.
A large rectangular window with clear tempered glass panes and a slim white frame. The glass is slightly reflective and the frame has clean straight lines for a modern look.
A pair of light beige fabric curtains with a soft drape and subtle texture. They hang from a slim metal rod and frame the window, adding warmth and a gentle contrast to the white frame.
A recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted white diffuser and slim circular housing. The fixture provides even, glare-free illumination suitable for a classroom environment.

A colorful educational poster with laminated surface displaying charts and diagrams. The poster uses bold primary colors and clear typography for easy reading. It is mounted with flat metal clips for a tidy presentation.

A round analog wall clock with a white face, black Arabic numerals, and slender black hands. The frame is a thin silver metal ring with a subtle brushed finish. The clock has a glass cover and a simple, classic design.

A lush green potted plant with several arching stems of glossy broad leaves. The plant sits in a simple matte ceramic pot in neutral gray. The foliage is vibrant and adds a touch of natural warmth to the corner.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of matte gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile. The rim is gently flared for easy disposal of paper and small trash items.
